abstract: bobsrepair -- new innovations to review cheating and price transparency .
article: there is a misunderstanding among many young people today that the main way to success is through a public school or college . it has left us with a large number of accompanying individuals : they have degrees but do not know what to do with them and they do not offer indisputable job openings . they clean up the deadlock job by not having the correct room for progressthey find their way into an accidental exchange or wealth and , really take some talent , profit and push their calls . excessive emphasis on school courses has blinded many young people to get genuine calls in talented or skilled trades .

since you are here then you should at least understand that skilled trading exists , but you may have questions . skilled trading terms include career paths requiring manual labor but far above simple levels of work or construction work . illustrations that ring a bell are : electrician , fitter pipe , plumber , mechanic , machinist , framer , carpenter , cabinet maker , hvac technician etc. . from the statistics collected from wikipedia . org , i observed that trade or skilled workers get more than a few college graduates but there is cheating in the same industry ; a skilled trading industry , and as we know , wherever fraud comes out , there must be distrust and where disbelief comes out , there will be no peace of mind for good deals , or services to be given or received .

given it from mind , i 'm introducing you to bob 's repair platform . bob 's repair platform : two siblings are the founders of this platform and they have been interacting with contract workers to consumers since 2013 , overhauling 55,000 buyers and generating over $ 1,000,000 of salary to their temporary workers through advertising activities . then , her two siblings . the brothers then chose to use blockchain technology which is the latest turning point in technological advances to tackle the substantial issues affecting the home improvement market now by building a bob improvement . bob 's repair 's platform changed the world by starting with temporary workers .

how ? someone may ask . the purpose of this platform ; bob 's repair 's primary objective was created for the purpose of eliminating fraud in the skilled trading industry by bringing all direct and low-cost customers , frankness and sincere feelings of calm while chasing a contract worker and one way to achieve this is to launch decentralization . website where search can be done by anyone with an interest in the worker and check how their services before signing it . advantages with bobs repairbobs repair is able to solve various problems on the service system wellbobs repair provides the best solution to provide comfortbobs repair can provide an increasing advantage , bobs repair , faster interaction and responsive responsiveness will also enhance a comfort in various activities and interactions .

mission bobs repairproviding an excellent service on the interaction of contractors and consumers to run well and no cases or problems occurentrusting on blockhain 's integrity system , to further increase the level of trust of consumers themselves . bobs repair has started since 2014 , with connections with 50,000 consumers , they are really trying to showcase a large market , bobsrepair visionbobsrepair 's primary vision is to build a credible network of groups . this network will wherever the customer will communicate with the contractor and waive the funds after completing each stage of the project . another vision of the bobsrepair project is to create a highly reliable and competent service provider , to provide ease to the client and create a great and superb market just for bobsrepair users who give you the experience to enjoy the greatness of its great technology right now .

problemreviewing fraud . advertising costs . price transparency . solutionto address review scams , hidden costs due to advertising costs , and increased costs due to the lack of price transparency , bob 's repair will build bob applications on blockchain steem . bob 's app will consist of powerful ios , android and web apps . bob 's application will utilize blockchain technology to counter fraud reviews . bob 's application will be built on blockchain steem due to a three-second transaction time and no transaction fees . bob 's application will keep all financial transactions that occur on bob repair on blockchain .

then , when both sides of the transaction -- the consumer and the contractor -- leave the review , the bob improvements will link the review to the actual financial transaction . by linking reviews with actual financial transactions , consumers can trust that the reviews are real and do not change . a real review , from real consumers , provide better information so that consumers can make better decisions . stwpstwp is a simple and automated business model reliability to achieve operational efficiency while enhancing profitability and scalability . stwp handles all aspects of business such as : managing contractors , collecting payments from contractors , hiring new contractors , answering messages and calls from contractors using bots , and managing outsourcing online advertising to two large teams of international internet advertisers .
